source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SEQ_00<tab>The stalwart soldier would request your company on a brief outing.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SEQ_00<tab>烈士庵の勇猛なる烈士は、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_TODO_01<tab>Sprinkle Gensui wine at the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_TODO_03<tab>Sprinkle Gensui wine at the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_TODO_05<tab>Sprinkle Gensui wine at the designated location.

TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_000<tab>You are <var 29 EB02 /var>, the hero who hails from the West. Aye, 'tis plain from the glimmer in your eyes and the strength in your bearing. I realize this is sudden, but will you accompany me outside?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_000<tab>お主、我らに協力しているという、西方の英雄だな？
鋭い眼光を放っておるゆえ、傍目にもわかったぞ。
ちょうどよい、ひとつ頼まれてはもらえぬか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_001<tab>It shan't take long, nor will there be any danger. Just a scenic walk to sprinkle wine at a handful of places.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_001<tab>なに、荒事とは無縁の簡単なことよ。
少しばかり外に出て、散歩がてら<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>を、
撒いてくれればよいだけのこと。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_002<tab>Doubtless you are wondering about the purpose of this activity. For now, I ask that you humor a comrade and think of it as a peculiar local tradition.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_002<tab>何の意味があるのか、疑問に思うかもしれないが、
異国の奇妙な風習とでも思ってくれればよいさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_003<tab>Here is the wine. Pray bring it with you to the docks. I shall tell you more as we make our way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_003<tab>この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」をもって、「城下船場」まで来てもらえるか？
詳しいことは、現地にて話すとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_010<tab>There you are. You have the wine, I trust? Pray give these grounds here a dash of it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_010<tab>待っていたぞ。
渡した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」を、そこに撒いてやってくれるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_011<tab>You have the wine I gave you, yes? Pray give these grounds here a dash of it.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_011<tab>渡した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」を、そこに撒いてやってくれるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_020<tab>The One River was the lifeline of trade for Doma and the key to her prosperity. In the past, countless ships and barges bearing all manner of cargo would pass through here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_020<tab>この無二江は、ヤンサにとって、かつては重要な運河であった。
往時には、多くの船乗りや荷運び人が、
さまざまな荷を担いで、行き交っていたものよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_021<tab>Come, let us move on. We next go to Monzen.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_021<tab>さて、次は「門前侍町」へ向かうとしよう。
ついて参られよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_030<tab>The town of Monzen was once home to those samurai families who served under Lord Kaien─kami rest his soul.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_030<tab>かつて、この門前侍町には、武家屋敷が軒を連ねていた。
ドマの先代国主、カイエン様に仕える侍たちが、
暮らしていたのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_031<tab>And here was where many young warriors gathered to hone their swordfighting skills. Go ahead and give the grounds a sprinkle of wine.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_031<tab>特にここに建っていた、剣術指南役の屋敷には、
腕を磨くため、多くの若者が集ったものだ。
さあ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」を、ここに撒いてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_032<tab>Go ahead, my friend. Give the grounds a sprinkle of wine.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_032<tab>さあ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」を、ここに撒いてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_040<tab>Good. Let us head to the western edge of town.

TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_050<tab>This manor once belonged to His Excellency the Tairo, one of our nation's leaders. He was known as an outstanding warrior and an exceptional poet besides, one of his admirers being no less a personage than Lord Kaien himself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_050<tab>ここは、かつて大老だった者の屋敷の跡地だ。
武芸にも秀でていたが、句の名人としても知られ、
句会では、カイエン様をもうならせるほどの俳人であった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_051<tab>Go on and sprinkle some wine here as well.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_051<tab>それでは、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」を、ここに撒いてくれるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_052<tab>Go on, sprinkle some wine here as well.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_052<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8001 /var>」を、ここに撒いてくれるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_060<tab>And that is the last spot. Let us make our way back, shall we?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_060<tab>これで、ひととおり巡り終わったな。
それでは、烈士庵へ戻るとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_070<tab>Now then, I believe an explanation is in order. Those places we visited are where many of our comrades fell fighting the Empire.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_070<tab>付き合ってくれて、ありがとう。
共に巡り、酒を撒いてもらった場所は、
何処も、我が同志が帝国との戦いで散った場所なのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_071<tab>When Yotsuyu tried to make an example of Monzen, they rose up and fought courageously to the last man.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_071<tab>代理総督ヨツユが、見せしめに門前侍町を破壊しようとしたとき、
勇敢にも抵抗し、命を落とした仲間たちのな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_072<tab>To receive an offering of wine from a hero such as you, I do not doubt that they will be pleased.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_072<tab>西方の英雄に酒を酌んでもらえて、
仲間たちも喜んでいるに違いないだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_073<tab>Aside from paying my respects, I wished to introduce you to them, you see. They will rest easier in the knowledge that we have allies strong and true who fight with us. My thanks for your company, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ705_02808_SADNESSSAMURAI_000_073<tab>お主のような、心強い仲間ができたことを、
同志たちに知ってもらいたく、かようなことを頼んだ次第。
最後まで付き合っていただき、心から感謝する。
